last_episode_to_air.name: My Best Friend's Wedding
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the season finale, Ashley and Phil finally tie the knot. Hencha confesses to Darnell that she thinks she might be pregnant. Tension between Kayla and Eric boils over, threatening to irreversibly damage their marriage.

name: WAGS Miami
overview: An inside look at what it's really like to have a relationship with a sports star while living in one of the most exciting cities in the world.

episodes.name: Welcome to Miami
episodes.overview: Hencha and Metisha attend an engagement brunch for Darnell; the girls confront Claudia after she gossips with Ashley; Larry and Nicole are engaged and Metisha finds out.

episodes.name: Ratchet by Association
episodes.overview: Tensions between Hencha and Claudia reach boiling point, Darnell is thrown for a loop when Reshad makes an announcement, and Astrid asks for help on her runway show but regrets her decision.

episodes.name: Girl Code
episodes.overview: The girls go to the Bahamas and Ashley confronts Claudia about her past. Hencha breaks girl code when she flirts with Astrid's crush.

episodes.name: Birthday Brawl
episodes.overview: Hencha confronts Vanessa when she hears a rumor; Darnell tries to patch things up with Claudia; Claudia heads up to Green Bay to support Julius.

episodes.name: What Would Vesus Do?
episodes.overview: Darnell decides she can't be financially dependent and takes steps to start a business, causing Reshad to question their relationship. Meanwhile, Ashley's father questions Phil about his intentions.

episodes.name: Put a Ring on It
episodes.overview: Phil pops the question before he leaves for the season; Hencha's new love interest is in town; Darnell confides in Claudia about her relationship.

episodes.name: Ring Toss
episodes.overview: Ashley starts to prep for her wedding, Metisha is on a date with a pro boxer and Darnell struggles with the latest developments in her relationship.

episodes.name: Girls Be Trippin'
episodes.overview: All hell breaks loose on a trip to Croatia when the tension between the girls comes to a head. Darnell is tired of Ashley's lack of consideration for her feelings and finally calls her out on it.

episodes.name: Reunion Special
episodes.overview: The cast gathers to discuss the first season.

episodes.name: Bride Wars
episodes.overview: Ashley butts heads with her future mother-in-law, Phyllis. Two new married WAGS are brought into the group but take an instant dislike to one another. Claudia and her rival Ashley attend a big game where their men play against each other.

episodes.name: Party Girl
episodes.overview: Astrid and Claudia confront Darnell at her birthday bash, concerned that she’s been going out and partying so much. Ashley wants to start planning her upcoming wedding, but gets derailed by Phil’s trip to the Super Bowl. Kayla sets Astrid up with a sexy baseball player friend.

episodes.name: Dueling Matchmakers
episodes.overview: Hencha goes ballistic when Faven sets up Astrid instead of her; Darnell realizes that she needs to re-prioritize her career; when Julius signs with a new team, Claudia gets concerned that his new teammates will be a bad influence on him.

episodes.name: Hencha's Revenge
episodes.overview: In the wake of their huge fight, Hencha gets revenge on Astrid; Ashley dreads breaking the news to her opinionated soon-to-be mother-in-law that they will have a destination wedding.

episodes.name: LA Bachelorette Bound
episodes.overview: Hencha's opinionated mother comes to town and pries into her dating life, offering unsolicited advice; Astrid hosts an anniversary party for her swimwear line where she finds out that Kayla has been acting two-faced.

episodes.name: Double Ds
episodes.overview: Ashley's bachelorette party continues; Phil has his own night out; Darnell interviews a new athlete for her podcast and sparks fly; Claudia agrees to do a photoshoot for Astrid, but cancels at the last minute, causing friction in their relationship.

episodes.name: Hurricane Phyllis
episodes.overview: Kayla admits to Faven that her marriage is on the rocks; Darnell finds out that Metisha used to date her new guy; Ashley and Phyllis get into a huge fight the day before her wedding when Phyllis questions Ashley's mothering skills.

episodes.name: My Best Friend's Wedding
episodes.overview: In the season finale, Ashley and Phil finally tie the knot. Hencha confesses to Darnell that she thinks she might be pregnant. Tension between Kayla and Eric boils over, threatening to irreversibly damage their marriage.
